description: Populates the schema for the specified endpoint. This is an asynchronous operation and can take several minutes. You can check the status of this operation by calling the DescribeRefreshSchemasStatus operation.

parameters.name: EndpointArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) string that uniquely identifies the endpoint.

parameters.name: ReplicationInstanceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the replication instance.

nested_items.name: RefreshSchemasStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the refreshed schema.

nested_items.name: EndpointArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) string that uniquely identifies the endpoint.

nested_items.name: ReplicationInstanceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the replication instance.

nested_items.name: LastRefreshDate
nested_items.description: The date the schema was last refreshed.

nested_items.name: LastFailureMessage
nested_items.description: The last failure message for the schema.
